description: Try our easy to follow Rum & Raisin Chocolate Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Rum & Raisin Chocolate Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Level tops of cakes using a serrated knife and cut each cake in half through the centre. Brush each with reserved rum. Place one cake on a stand and top with 1/4 of the icing. Repeat layers, top with final cake then spread top and side of cake with remaining icing. To achieve the naked effect, scrape back cake sides with a palette knife. Drizzle over caramel and top with remaining raisins.
